# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
Mat Rentals for Farm Credit Canada (FCC) Field Offices

## Reference Number
MX-43059574078

## Amended Solicitation Number
PS24-FS-003-2

## Publication Date
11 March 2024

## Tender Closing Date
08 April 2024, 16:00:00

## Project Overview

Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking a single floor mat rental service provider to supply reliable and consistent service to its field offices located across Canada. The successful bidder will be responsible for providing floor mat rental services for a portion of FCC's 100+ offices nationwide, as listed in Appendix A.

## Scope of Work

* Provide floor mat rental services in both official languages (English and French)
* Regularly replace dirty floor mats with clean mats of the same type and size at each office location
* Appoint a single account representative as the primary contact for the duration of the agreement

## Eligibility Criteria

* The bidder must be able to provide services in both official languages
* Bidders must have experience providing floor mat rental services to large-scale organizations
* Bidders must have a proven track record of reliability and consistency in their services

## Tender Details

* Tender submission deadline: 08 April 2024, 16:00:00
* Tender documents are available on [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)
* Fees may apply; see [www.merx.com/public/pricing](http://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information

## Contact Information

* Farid Sokolovic
* Procurement@fcc-fac.ca

## Notices

* Tender description and terms and conditions can be downloaded from [www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)
* This tender announcement is now expired. It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure they have the most up-to-date information before submitting an application. |
